sentences.sContent: If business success is what you want, than you need to take action.
sentences.sContent_eng: If business success is what you want, than you need to take action.
sentences.sCn: 但是，如果你想取得商业上的成功，那你就必须采取行动。

sentences.sContent: But at what point do we decide to take action?
sentences.sContent_eng: But at what point do we decide to take action?
sentences.sCn: 但是我们应该什么时候决定采取行动呢？
